about_the_game:
Use cards to fight the incoming hordes of infernal enemies & survive while building a different deck in each run.
Cards are your weapons, so choose wisely, combine them for maximum synergy and use them as you aim & shoot.
Add and remove cards from your deck, combine them with relics and find synergies.

Key Features:

  • Build your deck with over 100 different cards
  • Find over 50 relics that boost your cards and alter their effects
  • Fight over 12 different hellish enemies, coming at you in constant waves, and 3 bosses.
  • Unlock 3 characters, each with their own card management mechanic and unique cards
  • Survive 3 stages with different landscapes and challenges
